location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Collin Mactavish, Assistant Surgeon, in charge at Bushire to Major George Willock, in charge of the British Mission, Tabrize [Tabriz]

mods.abstract: The letter is informing Major George Willock of the death of the Resident in the Persian Gulf, John Macleod. It notes that prior to his death, the Resident placed Mactavish in charge of the Bushire Residency until relief can be sent from Bombay.
